    • defaultAmontOfLife

      public static int defaultAmontOfLife
      This static variable hold the amont of life each character has. In case the player whats to play again the life will be reseted to this value.

    • drawCharacter1OnTheScreen

      public void drawCharacter1OnTheScreen()
      This method draw on the screen the character on previous defined x,y position . This method use a random object to random display the image between the image 1 and 2 to give moviment. If the life of the character is below zero, the image display will be defeated one.
      Parameters:
      x - x position on the screen
      y - y position on the screen

    • eraseCharacterFromScreen

      public void eraseCharacterFromScreen()
      this method clean the screen exactly on the previous reaginon it was draw
